_comment0: filepath is the location to export the excel file (./ will export to same dir as exe)
_comment1: above to true will search for a single domain input by the user and disable other searches
_comment2: setting the above to true will update all_tlds.csv
_comment3: uses root_domains csv for the domain checks
_comment4: if general search is true the following (if set true) will run. setting to false disables all general searches
_comment5: ranges apply to their respective search if true - order is a-z then 0-9 then '-'
_comment6: so full search: begin=a end=9 (or end=- if not the first/last char)
